question: The "Larnaca Salt Lake" is located in which nation?
explanation: Larnaca Salt Lake is located in Cyprus. It is a complex of the network of four salt lakes-Aliki, Orphani, Soros and Spiro. It is the second-largest salt lake in Cyprus after the Limassol Salt Lake. It is a Ramsar Wetland, Specially Protected Area under the Barcelona Convention and an Important Bird Area. It houses halophytic scrubbed vegetation and Hala Sultan Tekke mosque.
